issue.title: [CF 842] Boss Cooldown (Thunderstruck)
issue.body:
Hi!

I'm actually playing a discipline priest and for a "perfect" use of Spirit Shell I was looking for an alert to show 15sec before a boss use specifics abilities. .

Although I've always found a solution for unusuals icons, this time I'm stuck.

All attempts (with Lei Shen thunderstruck) resulted in an inactive icon just showing spell texture and acting like spell was ready.

Somebody can tell me what I'm doing wrong?

Thanks in advance.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)

6.2.1

Do you have an error log of what happened?

No

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)

comments.body:
I don't know how this boss mechanic works, so I don't know if it would be caught by a unit cooldown. You can try using a combat event icon instead - there is a much greater chance that one of the Combat Event events will work for this.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Hi :)

I've take a look in DBM lua files and found a few things like this :

timer ThunderstruckCD:Start(25-delay, 1)

It seems to mean that I can't track this particular CD as a standard cooldown. And it must be the same for many boss abilities. I've never wonder how boss mods works now it's done ;)

Conclusion : unfortunately I can't get this warning with TMW. Gonna search somewhere else.

Thanks for the answer.


> Posted by CurseForge user alcynounette2
